00014 template <class T>
00015 struct TeraItem {
00016     T key;
00017     string content;
00018 };
00019 
00020 template <class T>
00021 ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const TeraItem<T>& v)
00022 {
00023     m << v.key;
00024     m << v.content;
00025     return m;
00026 }

00028 template <class T>
00029 obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, TeraItem<T>& v)
00030 {
00031     m >> v.key;
00032     m >> v.content;
00033     return m;

00035 
00036 template <class T>
00037 class TeraWorker {
00038 public:
00039     typedef TeraItem<T> VertexT;
00040     typedef vector<VertexT*> VertexContainer;
00041     typedef typename VertexContainer::iterator VertexIter;
00042 
00043     VertexContainer vertexes;
00044     double samp_rate;
00045     bool prefix;
00046 
00047     TeraWorker(double sampling_rate, bool prefixsum)
00048     {
00049         srand((unsigned)time(NULL));
00050         samp_rate = sampling_rate;
00051         prefix = prefixsum;
00052     }
00053 
00054     ~TeraWorker()
00055     {
00056         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++)
00057             delete vertexes[i];
00058     }
00059 
00060     inline void add_vertex(TeraItem<T>* vertex)
00061     {
00062         vertexes.push_back(vertex);
00063     }
00064 
00065     //user-defined graphLoader ==============================
00066     virtual TeraItem<T>* toVertex(char* line) = 0; //this is what user specifies!!!!!!
00067 
00068     void load_vertex(TeraItem<T>* v)
00069     { //called by load_graph
00070         add_vertex(v);
00071     }
00072 
00073     void load_graph(const char* inpath)
00074     {
00075         hdfsFS fs = getHdfsFS();
00076         hdfsFile in = getRHandle(inpath, fs);
00077         LineReader reader(fs, in);
00078         while (true) {
00079             reader.readLine();
00080             if (!reader.eof())
00081                 load_vertex(toVertex(reader.getLine()));
00082             else
00083                 break;
00084         }
00085         hdfsCloseFile(fs, in);
00086         hdfsDisconnect(fs);
00087         //cout<<"Worker "<<_my_rank<<": \""<<inpath<<"\" loaded"<<endl;//DEBUG !!!!!!!!!!
00088     }
00089     //=======================================================
00090 
00091     //user-defined graphDumper ==============================
00092     virtual void toline(VertexT* v) = 0; //this is what user specifies!!!!!!
00093 
00094     vector<char> buf;
00095     void write(const char* content)
00096     {
00097         int len = strlen(content);
00098         buf.insert(buf.end(), content, content + len);
00099     }
00100 
00101     void dump_partition(const char* outpath)
00102     {
00103         hdfsFS fs = getHdfsFS();
00104         char tmp[5];
00105         sprintf(tmp, "%d", _my_rank);
00106         hdfsFile hdl = getWHandle((string(outpath) + "/part_" + string(tmp)).c_str(), fs);
00107         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00108             VertexT* v = vertexes[i];
00109             if (buf.size() >= HDFS_BLOCK_SIZE) {
00110                 tSize numWritten = hdfsWrite(fs, hdl, &buf[0], buf.size());
00111                 if (numWritten == -1) {
00112                     fprintf(stderr, "Failed to write file!\n");
00113                     exit(-1);
00114                 }
00115                 buf.clear();
00116             }
00117             toline(v);
00118         }
00119         tSize numWritten = hdfsWrite(fs, hdl, &buf[0], buf.size());
00120         if (numWritten == -1) {
00121             fprintf(stderr, "Failed to write file!\n");
00122             exit(-1);
00123         }
00124         buf.clear();
00125         if (hdfsFlush(fs, hdl)) {
00126             fprintf(stderr, "Failed to flush");
00127             exit(-1);
00128         }
00129         hdfsCloseFile(fs, hdl);
00130         hdfsDisconnect(fs);
00131     }
00132     //=======================================================
00133 
00134     void key_sampling(vector<T>& splits) //key<=splits[i], to machine i
00135     {
00136         ResetTimer(4);
00137         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00138             cout << "============= Step 1: Key Sampling =============" << endl;
00139         vector<T> samples;
00140         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00141             double samp = ((double)rand()) / RAND_MAX;
00142             if (samp <= samp_rate) {
00143                 samples.push_back(vertexes[i]->key);
00144             }
00145         }
00146         if (_my_rank != MASTER_RANK) {
00147             //collect samples
00148             slaveGather(samples);
00149             samples.clear();
00150             //bcast samples
00151             slaveBcast(splits);
00152         } else {
00153             //collect samples
00154             vector<vector<T> > sampBufs(_num_workers);
00155             masterGather(sampBufs);
00156             for (int i = 0; i < _num_workers; i++) {
00157                 if (i != MASTER_RANK) {
00158                     samples.insert(samples.end(), sampBufs[i].begin(), sampBufs[i].end());
00159                 }
00160             }
00161             //sort samples
00162             sort(samples.begin(), samples.end());
00163             //compute splits
00164             int gap = samples.size() / _num_workers;
00165             if (gap == 0)
00166                 splits.swap(samples);
00167             else {
00168                 int residual = samples.size() % _num_workers;
00169                 int pos = 0;
00170                 for (int i = 0; i < _num_workers - 1; i++) //last sample may not be the largest item
00171                 {
00172                     int step = gap;
00173                     if (residual > 0) {
00174                         step++;
00175                         residual--;
00176                     }
00177                     splits.push_back(samples[pos + step - 1]);
00178                     pos += step;
00179                 }
00180             }
00181             //bcast samples
00182             masterBcast(splits);
00183         }
00184         StopTimer(4);
00185         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00186             cout << get_timer(4) << " seconds elapsed" << endl;
00187     }
00188 
00189     //=======================================================
00190     int getWorker(T key, vector<T>& splits)
00191     {
00192         if (splits.size() == 0)
00193             return 0;
00194         T last = splits.back();
00195         if (key > last)
00196             return _num_workers - 1;
00197         //////
00198         int pos = 0;
00199         for (int i = 0; i < splits.size(); i++) {
00200             if (key < splits[i] || key == splits[i])
00201                 return i;
00202         }
00203         return _num_workers - 1;
00204     }
00205 
00206     //--------------------------------------------------
00207     static bool VPointerComp(const VertexT* lhs, const VertexT* rhs)
00208     {
00209         return lhs->key < rhs->key;
00210     };
00211 
00212     void vertexExchange(vector<T>& splits)
00213     {
00214         ResetTimer(4);
00215         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00216             cout << "============= Step 2: Vertex Exchange and Sort =============" << endl;
00217         vector<VertexContainer> buf(_num_workers);
00218         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00219             VertexT* v = vertexes[i];
00220             int wid = getWorker(v->key, splits);
00221             buf[wid].push_back(v);
00222         }
00223         all_to_all(buf);
00224         //free sent vertices
00225         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00226             VertexT* v = vertexes[i];
00227             int wid = getWorker(v->key, splits);
00228             if (wid != _my_rank)
00229                 delete v;
00230         }
00231         //collect received vertices
00232         vertexes.clear();
00233         for (int i = 0; i < _num_workers; i++) {
00234             vertexes.insert(vertexes.end(), buf[i].begin(), buf[i].end());
00235         }
00236         //sort assigned vertices
00237         sort(vertexes.begin(), vertexes.end(), VPointerComp);
00238         StopTimer(4);
00239         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00240             cout << get_timer(4) << " seconds elapsed" << endl;
00241     }
00242 
00243     //=======================================================
00244     void prefixOrder()
00245     {
00246         ResetTimer(4);
00247         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00248             cout << "============= Step 3: Prefix Ordering =============" << endl;
00249         vector<int> sizes;
00250         int pre = 0;
00251         if (_my_rank != MASTER_RANK) {
00252             //collect sizes
00253             int size = vertexes.size();
00254             slaveGather(size);
00255             //get prefix number
00256             slaveScatter(pre);
00257         } else {
00258             //collect sizes
00259             vector<int> sizebuf(_num_workers);
00260             sizebuf[_my_rank] = vertexes.size();
00261             masterGather(sizebuf);
00262             //compute prefixes
00263             vector<int> pref(_num_workers);
00264             pref[0] = 0;
00265             for (int i = 1; i < _num_workers; i++) {
00266                 pref[i] = pref[i - 1] + sizebuf[i - 1];
00267             }
00268             //bcast prefix number
00269             masterScatter(pref);
00270             pre = pref[_my_rank];
00271         }
00272         //add pre to get order, append to content string
00273         char tmp[20];
00274         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00275             int order = pre + i;
00276             sprintf(tmp, "%d", order);
00277             VertexT* v = vertexes[i];
00278             v->content = string(tmp) + " " + v->content;
00279         }
00280         StopTimer(4);
00281         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00282             cout << get_timer(4) << " seconds elapsed" << endl;
00283     }
00284 
00285     // run the worker
00286     void run(const WorkerParams& params)
00287     {
00288         //check path + init
00289         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00290             if (dirCheck(params.input_path.c_str(), params.output_path.c_str(), _my_rank == MASTER_RANK, params.force_write) == -1)
00291                 exit(-1);
00292         }
00293         init_timers();
00294 
00295         //dispatch splits
00296         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00297         vector<vector<string> >* arrangement;
00298         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00299             arrangement = params.native_dispatcher ? dispatchLocality(params.input_path.c_str()) : dispatchRan(params.input_path.c_str());
00300             //reportAssignment(arrangement);//DEBUG !!!!!!!!!!
00301             masterScatter(*arrangement);
00302             vector<string>& assignedSplits = (*arrangement)[0];
00303             //reading assigned splits (map)
00304             for (vector<string>::iterator it = assignedSplits.begin();
00305                  it != assignedSplits.end(); it++)
00306                 load_graph(it->c_str());
00307             delete arrangement;
00308         } else {
00309             vector<string> assignedSplits;
00310             slaveScatter(assignedSplits);
00311             //reading assigned splits (map)
00312             for (vector<string>::iterator it = assignedSplits.begin();
00313                  it != assignedSplits.end(); it++)
00314                 load_graph(it->c_str());
00315         }
00316         worker_barrier();
00317         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00318         PrintTimer("Load Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00319 
00320         //=========================================================
00321 
00322         init_timers();
00323         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00324         vector<T> splits;
00325         key_sampling(splits);
00326         vertexExchange(splits);
00327         if (prefix)
00328             prefixOrder();
00329         worker_barrier();
00330         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00331         PrintTimer("Communication Time", COMMUNICATION_TIMER);
00332         PrintTimer("- Serialization Time", SERIALIZATION_TIMER);
00333         PrintTimer("- Transfer Time", TRANSFER_TIMER);
00334         PrintTimer("Total Computational Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00335 
00336         // dump graph
00337         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00338         dump_partition(params.output_path.c_str());
00339         worker_barrier();
00340         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00341         PrintTimer("Dump Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00342     }
00343 };
